entry.title: PCSX2
entry.restorewarning:
*Warning* Restoring game saves will overwrite and virtual memory cards and save states of the same name.

If you are unsure please backup your game saves and then restore your backup.

*Warning* The backup also contains the ini files for PCSX2. This means that you will need to modify your settings in PCSX2 if the backup contains settings not applicable to your machine.
